## ShallowCopy type

A value with immutable object properties

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ShallowCopy<T> = {
    [P in keyof T]: Immutable<T[P]>;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [Immutable](./global-types.immutable.md)
